term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - programmed-temperature chromatography (temperature programming)
term.title: programmed-temperature chromatography

item.text: A procedure in which the temperature of the column is changed systematically during a part or the whole of the separation.

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 819. 'Nomenclature for chromatography (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 827 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365040819)
